name: The-Presidential-Suite-Presidential-Suite-Living-Room
caption: Presidential Suite Living Room
alt:
The Presidential Suite of The Pierre, is the essence of Manhattan elegance and glamour. Exquisite Central Park and Manhattan views are framed among the splendid décor, where the suite’s perch on the 39th floor showcases striking vistas of the city, stretching beyond the George Washington Bridge on a clear day. Rich gold, silver and porcelain tones adorn the décor, which translates through the suite’s breathtaking living room, spacious dining room, refined bedrooms, and polished marble bathrooms.  

The living room features custom cabinetry, comfortable sofas and large upholstered arm chairs that overlook an elegant fireplace and 40” wall mounted television with a Bang & Olufsen home theater system, An impressive executive working desk and chair form part of the room.
 
The wallpaper is a pale gold paisley motif, which matches the hand-woven carpet. The suite also has custom Murano glass tables and floor lamps, a full bar and new sound-insulated, energy efficient windows with both blackout draperies and sheers, make the living room magnificent and majestic.
